channel.title: CrownCraft! 90 Slot server
channel.description:
Website:crowncraftserver.com *All votes to the server get $800 in game!* *1.6.2* ################################################CrownCraft############################################## CrownCraft offers tons of things to do with 40+ plugins! Survival with Factions, grief, raid, and PvP Creative (PlotMe) build what you want, when you want, how you like! with or without friends! SkyBlock can you start from nothing and work your way to everything? CrownCraft's co-op SkyBlock adventure! Survival Games is here! Battle your friends. With our three Mob Arena maps each to offer something different in a great way to fight mobs! Play The Walls with your friends! McMMo rank up and become a great force. New Feature Parkour!
And yes we have our very own plugin dev! Who has made CrownCraft some awesome plugins! - Cleardrops - Particlesforplayer - BetterFood - Grappling And many more! #################################################OurStaff################################################ Our staff is there for you ask use questions about the server. Anything you might need help with no question is stupid! we might get a little crazy but we know the limits ;).
Hope you enjoy your stay and have fun!
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Th8HZ1B4t30[/youtube]
